title: George Clinton (Part 1)
itunes:title: George Clinton (Part 1)
description:
Much like Questlove, THIS is the moment we've been waiting for! The opportunity to sit with "God himself", aka George Clinton, is not one Team Supreme took lightly. This is what we know, George Clinton redefined and re-established Funk through his Parliment-Funkadelic collective. His impact can be heard throughout the evolution and maturation of Hip Hop, Pop and R&B music. What don't we know? Oh you're gonna have to listen to find out... Check out part ONE of our George Clinton class.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
